welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pageralam, Indonesia! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful natural landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Steak warung tenda chef dadang
restaurants.description: Steak warung tenda chef dadang is a café located in Pagaralam.

restaurants.name: Bakso Ceker Ayam (BCA2)
restaurants.description: Bakso Ceker Ayam (BCA2) is a dumpling restaurant located in Pagaralam.
restaurants.address: Pagaralam (Jl. Kol Noerdin Pandji), Pagaralam, Indonesia Sumsel 31512

restaurants.name: RM Mumtaz
restaurants.description: RM Mumtaz is a comfort food restaurant located in Pagaralam.
restaurants.address: Jl. Kombes H. Umar, Pagar Alam, Sumatera Selatan

restaurants.name: Martabak manis simpang telaga
restaurants.description: Martabak manis simpang telaga is a bakery located in Pageralam.
restaurants.address: Simpang tiga telaga biru (Jalan gunung), Pagaralam, Sumatera Selatan

restaurants.name: Pempek Citra
restaurants.description: Pempek Citra is a asian restaurant located in Pageralam.
restaurants.address: Jalan mayor ruslan no 16 (depan pegadaian) (Jalan gunung), Pagaralam, Sumatera Selatan
